No David, I have not looked at the Parameterized test runner for this
particular problem, although I have used it on other projects. I shall
have a look at it ASAP.
I was lured by the name "Parameterized", but now that I am thinking a
bit about it, it should really do what I need.

Thanks for your patience

Arnaud
